creator: saden1@yahoo.com
text:
It seems that it is not possible to pass arguments to Ant from within a target.
Something like this:

<target name="doSomething" description="example" >    
  <antarg line="-verbose"/>
   ....do something here
</target>

or

<target name="doSomething" description="example" antarg="-verbose">    
   ....do something here
</target>


All I want is the ability to make some targets be verbose.

creator: jan@materne.de
text:
Base idea is that the user decides how much is logged not the buildscript. You 
can also start a new Ant instance with -verbose parameter using <java>.
